skill.name: move-code-quality
skill.description: Analyzes Move language packages against the official Move Book Code Quality Checklist. Use this skill when reviewing Move code, checking Move 2024 Edition compliance, or analyzing Move packages for best practices. Activates automatically when working with .move files or Move.toml manifests.
skill.summary: Analyzes Move language packages against the official Move Book Code Quality Checklist. Use this skil...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. It contains only documentation and instructions for an AI model to follow when analyzing Move code. No file system access, network calls, command execution, or environment variable access occurs within the skill definition itself.

content.value_statement: Move code reviews require deep knowledge of the Move Book Code Quality Checklist. This skill provides automated analysis against 50+ rules for Move 2024 Edition best practices including code organization, function signatures, testing patterns, and modern syntax.
actual_capabilities: Scans Move projects for Move.toml and .move files
Reviews function signatures, parameter ordering, and visibility modifiers
Validates module syntax, imports, and constants naming
Evaluates loop macros, Option macros, and modern syntax usage
limitations: Does not execute or compile Move code
Does not fix issues automatically (offers suggestions only)
Does not access external APIs or online resources

use_cases.title: Code Review Before Deploy
use_cases.description: Review Move packages against official checklist before mainnet deployment

use_cases.title: Blockchain Security Analysis
use_cases.description: Audit smart contract code for quality issues and best practice violations

use_cases.title: Learn Modern Move Patterns
use_cases.description: Get feedback on code while learning Move 2024 Edition standards

prompt_templates.title: Full Package Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my Move package for code quality issues. Check Move.toml configuration, all .move files, and test modules against the Move Book checklist.

prompt_templates.title: Specific File Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this Move file for quality issues. Focus on function signatures, parameter ordering, and modern syntax usage.

prompt_templates.title: Manifest Validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my Move.toml file. Check edition specification, dependencies, and named address configuration.

prompt_templates.title: Testing Best Practices
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my Move tests. Check test attributes, naming conventions, assertions, and cleanup patterns.

output_examples.input: Analyze my Move package for quality issues
output: Summary: 12 checks passed, 5 improvements recommended, 2 critical issues
Critical Issue: Missing Move 2024 Edition in Move.toml
Important: Legacy module syntax detected - use modern semicolon syntax
Recommendation: Update function parameter ordering - objects should come before primitives

best_practices: Run this skill before committing Move code to catch quality issues early
Focus on critical issues first - Move 2024 Edition is required for modern features
Use the provided examples to understand both problematic and correct patterns
anti_patterns: Skipping this review before mainnet deployment
Ignoring parameter ordering guidelines - they enable proper composability
Using outdated explicit framework dependencies in Move.toml

faq.question: Which Move editions are supported?
faq.answer: Only Move 2024 Edition (2024.beta or 2024) is supported. All checklist features require this edition.

faq.question: Does this skill compile my code?
faq.answer: No. This skill analyzes code structure and patterns. Use the Move compiler for syntax checking.

faq.question: Can this skill fix issues automatically?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides detailed feedback with code examples but does not modify your files.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill only reads files you explicitly request to analyze. No code leaves your environment.

faq.question: How does this compare to a Move linter?
faq.answer: This skill checks 50+ best practice rules including naming, structure, and composability that linters may miss.

faq.question: What blockchain frameworks work with this skill?
faq.answer: Primary focus is on Sui Move patterns. The checklist aligns with Move Book standards for all Move chains.
